1. Head into your User Settings by pressing the cogwheel [] icon.

Cogwheel icon

2. Press on the Connections tab. To remove a connection, press on the X icon.

Press X to remove connection

3. You’ll receive a prompt of confirmation to remove. To fully remove it, press on Disconnect.

Disconnect button to confirm removal of connection

Contact Us: Having trouble connecting an account to your Discord account? Please reach out to our Support team: dis.gd/contact

articles.name: Archived Version: Discord Advertising IAB Addendum
articles.title: Archived Version: Discord Advertising IAB Addendum
articles.body:
Archived Version: This version of the Discord Addendum is archived as of May 16, 2025. You can find the current version of Discord Advertising IAB Addendum here.

This Discord Advertising IAB Addendum (this “Discord Addendum”), which amends and supplements the IAB STANDARD TERMS AND CONDITIONS FOR INTERNET ADVERTISING FOR MEDIA BUYS ONE YEAR OR LESS VERSION 3.0 (the “IAB Terms” and collectively with this Discord Addendum, the “Campaign Terms”), governs and forms a part of any applicable insertion order  (the “IO”) signed by and between Discord Inc. (“Media Company”) and the advertiser designated on an IO (“Advertiser”), or, if applicable, Advertiser’s agency designated on an IO (“Agency”).  The terms of this Discord Addendum will control over and fully supersede any similar, conflicting, inconsistent or overlapping terms in the IAB Terms or other parts of an IO; however, if an IO expressly states that certain terms set forth in the IO are intended to supersede the terms of this Discord Addendum, then, in the event of conflict, those terms of the applicable IO will control only for that IO and only to the extent of such conflict. Any purchase order terms, “clickthrough” or other online agreements, or other similar documents made available to Media Company by Advertiser or Agency are hereby rejected by Media Company and will not apply to any Quest. Capitalized terms used but not defined herein will have the meanings given to such terms in the IAB Terms. 

Where Advertiser is purchasing directly from Media Company, (i) Section 2 and any references to Agency herein will be deemed deleted and will not apply; and (ii) all references in the IAB Terms to Agency, will be deemed to be references to Advertiser.

1. Quest Terms.

a. Quests. Media Company will implement a promotional campaign on its platform (the “Discord Platform”) for Advertiser’s applicable property designated on an IO (the “Advertiser Property”) where eligible users of the Discord Platform will be able to complete certain agreed-upon tasks relating to the Advertiser Property and earn certain agreed-upon rewards (“Rewards”), as further detailed in an applicable IO (each such campaign, a “Quest”).  

b. Quest T&Cs. Media Company will, in consultation with Advertiser or Agency, as applicable, establish the specific terms and requirements for users governing each Quest (“Quest T&Cs”), and will publish the Quest T&Cs to users in connection with such Quest. The Quest T&Cs will address, at a minimum (i) user eligibility requirements and any criteria and tasks that must be satisfied by a user in order to receive a Reward; (ii) the nature of the applicable Reward, including whether the Reward will be supplied by Media Company (each, a “Media Company Reward”) or Advertiser (each, an “Advertiser Reward”); and (iv) any other terms, conditions and limitations pertaining to the redemption and use of the Reward.  

c. Advertiser Rewards. Unless otherwise indicated on an IO, the Reward will be an Advertiser Reward approved by Media Company and either the Advertiser or Agency, as applicable. For any Quest with an Advertiser Reward: (i) reasonably in advance of the applicable flight dates for a Quest, the parties will agree in writing (email to suffice) on and implement the fulfillment and redemption mechanics for the Advertiser Reward, which may consist of the delivery to Media Company of a sufficient number of redemption codes for users to redeem for Advertiser Rewards; (ii) Advertiser or Agency, as applicable, will ensure that the Advertiser Reward and the redemption process is consistent with the Quest T&Cs; and (iii) in the event of any fulfillment or redemption issues (including, without limitation, insufficient or defective redemption codes) in connection with a Quest, Media Company may suspend such Quest until such issues are resolved.  For clarity, Advertiser is solely responsible for the Advertiser Rewards and any associated fraud, losses, or other issues in connection with such Advertiser Rewards. 

d. Media Company Rewards.  For any Quest where the applicable IO indicates there will be a Media Company Reward, Media Company will (i) ensure that such Media Company Reward and redemption process is consistent with the Quest T&Cs; and (ii) will have responsibility (unless otherwise agreed in the IO) and control over the design and creation of such Media Company Reward. Media Company will obtain Advertiser’s or Agency’s approval (not to be unreasonably withheld) for any Media Company Reward that contains or is derived from Advertising Materials. Media Company Rewards may not be available to users in certain regions where not supported by the Discord Platform. Advertiser and Agency may not terminate for convenience any Quest with (i) a Media Company Reward that contains or is derived from Advertising Materials or (ii) any other custom Media Company Reward created specifically for the Quest. 

e. Advertiser Marks License. 

i. Advertiser and Agency hereby grant Media Company a limited, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use and display Advertiser’s name, designated trademarks and associated logos, and any names, trademarks or logos associated with the Advertiser Property (the “Advertiser Marks”) in connection with the implementation of a Quest, the performance of Media Company’s obligations under the Campaign Terms and any IO, or as otherwise approved in writing by Advertiser or Agency. 

ii. All goodwill and improved reputation generated by Media Company’s use of the Advertiser Marks inures to the exclusive benefit of Advertiser. Media Company will use the Advertiser Marks in a manner consistent with any branding guidelines provided by Advertiser to Media Company in writing.

f. Advertising Materials.  Advertiser and Agency hereby grant Media Company a limited, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, display, adapt, translate, modify, copy, publicly perform, transmit and distribute the Advertising Materials in connection with the implementation or promotion of a Quest, the performance of Media Company’s obligations under the Campaign Terms or as otherwise approved by Advertiser or Agency, as applicable, including, without limitation, in connection with the development, distribution and making available of applicable Media Company Rewards containing or derived from such Advertising Materials. The licenses set forth herein are sublicensable by Media Company to its affiliates, agents, and subcontractors in connection with Media Company performance hereunder (and, with respect to Media Company Rewards containing or derived from Advertising Materials, to end users who claim any such Media Company Rewards in connection with a Quest). Advertiser or Agency, as applicable, will, at its own cost and expense, obtain all necessary licenses, consents, approvals and permissions from any third party required for Media Company to exercise its rights under the foregoing license. For purposes of the Campaign Terms, “Advertising Materials” means any content, materials, copy, branding, images, names, audio, music, video, artwork, designs, descriptions, specifications, and other elements made available by Advertiser or Agency to Media Company for use in connection with a Quest, including, without limitation, any elements, materials, assets or intellectual property from the Advertiser Property. 

g. Cooperation.  Media Company’s ability to implement the Quest and its obligations under the Campaign Terms and any IO (including, without limitation, the ability to meet the applicable timeframes and schedules for a Quest as specified in an IO) will be contingent upon the timely provision of cooperation from Advertiser or Agency, as applicable, in connection with the Quest, which cooperation includes, without limitation, providing any redemption codes, Advertising Materials and/or Advertiser Rewards as required by Media Company with sufficient lead time for the applicable Quest, compliance with applicable Policies or other campaign and asset specifications, and timely feedback, reviews and approvals for any items and matters requiring approval or input in connection with a Quest. Advertiser and Agency will adhere to any Policies and other agreed upon timeframes, campaign specifications, and development schedules in connection with the foregoing. Media Company will not be liable or responsible for any delays or issues caused by Advertiser’s or Agency’s failure or delay in providing such cooperation.

h. Quest Prompts.  Media Company will be responsible for developing, producing, and displaying prompts or notifications promoting the availability of a Quest (“Quest Prompts”) to certain users on applicable surfaces within the Discord Platform. Notwithstanding anything to the contrary, Media Company will have ultimate authority and control over the content, placement, frequency, delivery, timing and accompanying disclosures in connection with all Quest Prompts on the Discord Platform. Media Company reserves the right to suspend or cancel the targeting, personalization, and/or delivery of Quest Prompts in connection with any Quest.  

i. Reporting.  For each Quest, Media Company will provide summary reports to Advertiser or Agency, as applicable, regarding certain estimated performance metrics, insights and KPIs within a reasonable timeframe after the midpoint and end date of such Quest. The information in such reports may be used by Advertiser solely for its own internal business purposes but will otherwise be considered Media Company’s Confidential Information. 

j. Estimates.  Notwithstanding anything to the contrary, any impression or reach numbers, impression-related commitments, targeting parameters, geographies or estimates provided on an IO and any information provided in connection with any report delivered by Media Company with respect to any Quest are provided by Media Company solely on an “AS IS” basis as estimates for informational purposes based on the data reasonably available to Media Company and are not guaranteed or considered binding by the parties in connection with any Quest. Media Company will not be liable (or required to offer any makegood) for any errors, shortfalls, inaccuracies or omissions in connection with any of the foregoing.

2. Agency Authority.  Agency represents, warrants and covenants that it has obtained and will maintain all consents, approvals and authorizations from Advertiser necessary for Agency to (i) bind Advertiser to the Campaign Terms and any IO, act on behalf of Advertiser and otherwise comply with its obligations in connection with the Campaign Terms and any IO, including, without limitation, with respect to (a) the execution of any IOs on Advertiser’s behalf, (b) the ability to pay Media Company for any Quest; (c) the ability to share Advertiser’s Confidential Information with Media Company; and (c) the management and provision of any and all approvals, feedback and reviews in connection with the Campaign Terms and any IO (e.g., the review and approval of Rewards and other Quest elements, press releases, promotional materials, or creative assets); and (ii) grant the licenses set forth in the Campaign Terms and any IO, including, without limitation, any such licenses to Advertiser Marks and Advertising Materials set forth herein. Media Company will be entitled to rely on any documents executed, instructions provided or approvals granted by Agency on an Advertiser’s behalf in connection with the Campaign Terms and any IO. Agency will indemnify and hold Media Company harmless from and against any losses or unpaid obligations under any IOs arising from Agency’s violation of this Section. 

3. Taxes. Unless otherwise stated in an IO, Media Company’s fees do not include any direct or indirect local, state, federal or foreign taxes, levies, duties or similar governmental assessments of any nature, including value-added, use, sales or withholding taxes collected by any jurisdiction. Each party is responsible for all of its own business taxes (including, but not limited to, net income, gross receipts, franchise, or other similar business taxes) arising as a result of or in connection with any IO. Advertiser or Agency, as applicable, is responsible for self-assessing any transaction taxes (e.g. sales tax, VAT, GST or similar taxes) due with respect to any IO. Media Company will collect, and Advertiser or Agency, as applicable, will pay any applicable transaction taxes if Media Company determines that it has a duty to collect such taxes. Advertiser or Agency, as applicable, is responsible for any transaction taxes on user rewards redeemed outside of the Discord Platform. For transaction tax purposes, Quests will be treated as services related to promotional advertising campaigns. To the extent withholding tax is required by applicable law, Advertiser or Agency, as applicable, will be responsible for collecting and remitting such taxes to the appropriate tax authorities. Additionally, Advertiser or Agency, as applicable, will provide Media Company an original receipt or documentation from the tax authority for the withholding tax payments.

4. Amendments to IAB Terms. 

a. General Acknowledgements.  The parties acknowledge and agree that: (i) Quests are treated as flat-fee based Deliverables delivered on the Discord Platform for purposes of the IAB Terms; (ii) the terms of the IAB Terms relating to inventory availability, delivery schedule, ad placement and positioning, use of collected data, and reporting will be superseded and governed by the applicable terms of Section 1 of this Discord Addendum and any IO; and (iii) Quests do not use or involve any Third Party Ad Server and any associated terms in the IAB Terms do not apply.

b. Specific Amendments. 

i. Section X(b) of the IAB Terms is hereby amended to add the following new subclauses (iv) and (v):

“(iv) allegations that the Advertising Materials or Advertiser Marks infringe, misappropriate or otherwise violate any intellectual property rights of a third party; or (v) Advertiser Rewards, including, without limitation, any claims from users that Advertiser Rewards were misleading or inaccurate or that they were not properly fulfilled.”

ii. Section XI of the IAB Terms is hereby amended and restated as follows:

“Excluding Agency’s, Advertiser’s, and Media Company’s respective indemnification obligations under the Campaign Terms, damages that result from a breach of Section XII, or intentional misconduct by Agency, Advertiser, or Media Company, in no event will any party be liable (i) for any consequential, indirect, incidental, punitive, special, or exemplary damages whatsoever or any damages for loss of profits, business interruption, loss of information, and the like, incurred by another party arising out of an IO, even if such party has been advised of the possibility of such damages; or (ii) in the aggregate in connection with these Campaign Terms or the IO in excess of the amount paid or payable by Agency or Advertiser to Media Company hereunder.”

iii. For purposes of Section XIV(d) of the IAB Terms, the choice of law governing any IO will be the State of New York without reference to its choice of law rules, and all claims, legal proceedings or litigations arising in connection with the Campaign Terms will be brought solely in state and federal courts located in New York City.

iv. Section XIV.e of the IAB Terms is hereby amended and restated as follows:

“All notices of termination or breach must be in English, in writing and addressed to the other party’s legal department (with a copy to any contact listed on an IO). The email address for notices being sent to the Media Company legal department is legal.notices@discordapp.com. All other notices must be in English, in writing (including email) and addressed to the other party’s applicable notice information designated on an IO. Notice will be treated as given on receipt, as verified by written or automated receipt or by electronic log (as applicable).”

articles.name: How to Connect your Roblox Account to Discord
articles.title: How to Connect your Roblox Account to Discord
articles.body:
What this article covers:
  • What is Roblox?
  • How to Connect Your Roblox Account to Your Discord Account
    • Desktop/Browser
    • Mobile

What is Roblox?

Roblox is an online platform where users can play and create games using the platform's design tools, with millions of user-generated experiences ranging from obstacle courses to role-playing adventures. Players can customize their avatars and socialize with friends while exploring the diverse virtual worlds.

How to Connect Your Roblox Account to Your Discord Account

Desktop/Browser

1. Head into your User Settings by pressing the cogwheel [] icon.

Cogwheel icon

2. Press on the Connections tab, select the View More [] icon, and then press the Roblox icon. 

Connections tab under User Settings

3. You’ll then see a spot to log into your Roblox account if you’re not already logged in. Enter your login information and then press on Log In.

4. If you see the correct Roblox account listed, press on Continue otherwise press on Change Account to log into a different account.

Roblox account confirmation

5. You will then see a window where you need to confirm various Roblox information before finalizing the account connection. After confirming everything is correct, press on Continue.

Roblox settings

6. Confirm everything listed is correct and press on Confirm and Give Access.

Confirm and Give access prompt

6. You’ll know you’ve successfully connected when you receive a Connected your Roblox account to Discord message.

Confirmation window that your Roblox account has been connected to Discord

Mobile

1. Tap your avatar icon in the bottom-right corner of the app to navigate to your profile. 

Avatar icon

2. Tap on the cogwheel [] icon in the top-right corner.

Cogwheel icon

4. Press on Connections and then press on Add in the top-right corner. Scroll down until you see Roblox and select it.

Roblox under connections

5. If you’re not logged into your Roblox account already, you’ll have the option to log in. Enter your account details to proceed. If you are already logged in, press on Continue to confirm if you’re seeing the right Roblox account.

Confirmation window of Roblox account

6. You will then see a window where you need to confirm various Roblox information  before finalizing the account connection. After confirming everything is correct, press on Continue.

 

Continue button to confirm connection

7. Confirm everything listed is correct and press on Confirm and Give Access.

Confirm and Give Access confirmation

8. You’ll know you’ve successfully connected when you receive a Connected your Roblox account to Discord message.

Confirmation of Roblox being connected to your Discord account

Contact Us: If you run into any issues with linking your Roblox account to your Discord account, please reach out to our support team through here: http://dis.gd/contact

articles.name: Epic Games x Discord 2025 Promo
articles.title: Epic Games x Discord 2025 Promo
articles.body:
Starting from May 15, 2025 (11:00AM ET) to June 12, 2025 (11:00AM ET), Epic Game Store members can claim 1 month of Discord Nitro from the Epic Games Store. Learn below about how you can claim Discord Nitro.

Promotion Summary

Offer Details: 1 month of Discord Nitro

Who is Eligible: Users who have had an active Nitro subscription or Nitro trial in the last 12 months are not eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

This promotion is not eligible in the following regions: Syria, Russia, Turkey, Iran, North Korea, Zaporizhzhia, Kherson, Donetsk, and Luhansk.

Users who have had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on their accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If a user has a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on their account and they’ve never had a Nitro subscription, redeeming this promotion will override that subscription.

We will not be able to refund any leftover time from those subscription types, and the user will be forfeiting the remainder of the existing subscription when activating the 1 month Nitro trial.

Users who have already claimed a gift from this promotion are not eligible to claim further gifts from this promotion.

This promotion is not available in the following regions: Syria, Russia, Turkey, Iran, North Korea, Zaporizhzhia, Kherson, Donetsk, and Luhansk. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Requirements: Claim through an email from the Epic Games Store by June 12, 2025 (11:00AM ET) and redeem in your Discord account by July 12, 2025 (2:59 AM ET).

Subscription: After the 1 month trial period, your Nitro subscription will convert to a monthly recurring subscription, and Discord will bill your payment method per month until you cancel it. You can cancel at any time in your Discord User Settings. 

What this article covers:
  • What is Discord Nitro?
  • How do I claim the Nitro Promo from my Epic Games Store account?  
  • How do I redeem the Nitro Trial on my Discord Account? 
    • Eligibility for Redeeming the Nitro Trial
    • Step by Step Redeem Instructions
      • What if I am an Active Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting Member? 
  • Frequently Asked Questions
    • Promotion Details
    • Eligibility for the Promotion
    • Payment Info and Subscription Questions
    • Potential Errors and Other Issues

What is Discord Nitro?

Discord Nitro is our subscription plan that gives you access to special perks that’ll make your time on Discord as fun as ever! Personalize and enhance your experience with popular perks like HD streaming, 500MB file uploads, profile and avatar customizations, 2 free Server Boosts, and more:

  • Custom Emojis
  • Discord App Color Themes
  • Super Reactions
  • Avatar Decorations
  • Unique Server Profiles
  • Server Boosts
  • More Nitro & Nitro Basic perks

How do I claim the Nitro Promo from my Epic Games Store account?  

Info: In order to claim this Nitro trial promotion, you must have an Epic Games Store account.

1. Head over to the Epic Game Store app from May 15, 2025 (11:00AM ET) to June 12, 2025 (11:00AM ET) and you should see the Nitro trial promotion on the homepage. 

2. Press on the promotion to get started on redeeming Nitro.

3. Then, check your email tied to your Epic Games Store account to find an email from the Epic Games Store about this promotion. Try searching for "Nitro" in your email inbox!

Info: Please make sure the email address associated with your Epic Games Store account is current and correct! Allow for up to 24 hours for email delivery and check your spam folder.

4. Once you have found the email, follow the prompts to claim the Nitro trial and you'll be automatically redirected to a browser window to redeem the promotion.

The unique promotion link will look like this: https://discord.com/billing/promotions/XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX 

How do I redeem the Nitro Trial on my Discord Account?

Once you have claimed the promo link, you'll now need to officially redeem this promo link on your Discord account (or share this code with a friend). You must redeem this Nitro trial by July 12, 2025 (2:59 AM ET).

Eligibility for Redeeming the Nitro Trial

Info: This promotion is not available in the following regions: Syria, Russia, Turkey, Iran, North Korea, Zaporizhzhia, Kherson, Donetsk, and Luhansk. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Users who have had an active Nitro subscription or Nitro trial in the last 12 months are not eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Users who have had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on their accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If a user has a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on their account and they’ve never had a Nitro subscription, redeeming this promotion will override that subscription.

Users who have already claimed a gift from this promotion are not eligible to claim further gifts from this promotion.

Step by Step Redeem Instructions

If you're eligible and ready to redeem this Nitro subscription on your own Discord account, you can follow these steps below to redeem the promo.

Important:
- Before redeeming Nitro, make sure you are logged in your own Discord account.
- If you accidentally redeemed the Nitro promo on an account that is not yours, we are unable to provide you with another promo.

Step 1 - Pressing the Promo Link/Copy and Pasting into your Browser Window

  • Start by directly pressing the promotion link or right clicking the link to copy and paste the link into your browser window.
Tip: If you're redeeming this Nitro promo link in the Discord Gift Inventory, enter only your unique 24-digit code from the Nitro promotion link in the following format: XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX

Step 2 - Logging into Discord

  •  If you're not already logged into Discord in your browser, you will then be automatically redirected to either:

Register for a New Account

If you don't have an account, you can directly register a new Discord account

Login to your Account

If you already have a Discord account, you can login to your account using your email and password or using QR code login

Step 3 - Confirming the Correct Account and Payment Method

  • Once you have logged into your Discord account, you'll see a new message asking you to confirm that you are accepting the Nitro subscription on the correct Discord account.
    • You'll see a notice saying: "You are accepting this gift as _________" 
  • If your Discord account does not have your payment information, you'll be asked to fill out your payment details. (Note: You will not be charged until the free trial ends and the subscription renews)
  • When you've filled out all the necessary information and you're ready to redeem this promotion, press the "Accept Gift" button. 
Tip: If you're logged into the incorrect Discord account, press the Wrong account button to login to the other account.

Step 4 - Subscription Now Activated

After accepting the promo to your account, you'll now be automatically redirected to your Subscriptions tab in your User Settings to see your newly activated Nitro subscription on your account.

What if I am an Active Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting Member? 

Just to clarify - if you have had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on your account and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

So long as you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on your account and you’ve never had a Nitro subscription, you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 1 month Nitro subscription.

Important: By choosing to activate this 1 month trial, you will lose any features associated with your current subscriptions, and you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current subscription.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro subscription per month unless you cancel your subscription.

How do I share my Code with a Friend?

If you're unable to redeem the Nitro subscription link, you can share this link with a friend to use instead.

After you find the email from the Epic Games Store with the promotion link, you can directly copy the promotion link and send it to a friend. We recommend sending the link in a private direct message. Make sure your friend redeems the code by July 12, 2025 (2:59 AM ET).

Frequently Asked Questions

We know there's a lot of information to unpack on this promotion above, so we've also broken down this information in this FAQ section as well too.

  • Promotion Details
  • Eligibility for the Promotion
  • Payment Info and Subscription Questions
  • Potential Errors and Other Issues
    • Already Had/Have Nitro
    • Already Redeemed
    • Something's Wrong Here

Promotion Details

Q: How long does this promotion run for?

A: Epic Games Store users can claim Discord Nitro promo between May 15, 2025 (11:00AM ET) to June 12, 2025 (11:00AM ET).

After July 12, 2025 (2:59 AM ET), Epic Game Store users will no longer be able to claim a trial promo.

Q: How long does the Discord Nitro promotion last for?

A: You must redeem the Nitro promotion by July 12, 2025 (2:59 AM ET).

If a code has not been redeemed to the Discord account by July 12, 2025 (2:59 AM ET) it will expire and you will no longer be able to have 1 month of Discord Nitro.

Eligibility for the Promotion

Q: Who can claim this promotion?

A: You must have an Epic Games Store account to claim this promotion through an email sent from the Epic Games Store to your email associated with your Epic Games Store account.

Q: Who can redeem this Nitro trial to their Discord account?

A: Users who have never had an active Nitro subscription on their Discord accounts are eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Additionally, users who previously had a Discord Nitro subscription and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months are ineligible.

This promotion is not available in the following regions: Syria, Russia, Turkey, Iran, North Korea, Zaporizhzhia, Kherson, Donetsk, and Luhansk. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Q: What if I'm a current or previous Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or a Server Boost subscription? Can I also take part in this promotion? 

A: If you previously had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on your accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on your account and you’ve never had a Nitro subscription,  you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 1 month Nitro subscription.

Important: By choosing to activate this 1 month trial, you will lose any features associated with your current subscriptions, and **you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current subscription**.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro subscription per month unless you cancel your subscription.

Payment Info and Subscription Questions

Q: Why do I need to submit my payment info to redeem Nitro?

A: Because Nitro is a subscription plan, at the end of your 1 month trial, we will start your first billing cycle so you can continue to enjoy Nitro on Discord.

However, you can cancel the Nitro subscription at any time before the end of the 1 month.

Q: Why do I see a temporary hold/charge on my account when this is supposed to be a free promotion?

A: Just to clarify, this Nitro promotion is free, however, there will be a temporary hold placed on the payment method upon activating the promotion. This is to help Discord confirm the payment method works as expected and to prevent the use of fraudulent payment methods. This charge will appear in your Discord transaction history, and it may appear as a hold on your payment method.

We immediately reverse the temporary hold, and you’ll see that reflected in your Discord transaction history. Your bank may take longer to remove the hold from your payment method.

Info: Banks will usually remove the temporary hold from your account within a few business days.

If your Discord transaction history does not show the hold released after 5 business days, please let us know at https://dis.gd/contact, and our support team will be able to investigate this issue further.

Potential Errors and Other Issues

Q: What if I didn't receive an email from Epic Games Store with the Nitro promo link, even if I have an Epic Games Store account?

A: In order to receive an email from Epic Games Store with the Nitro promo link, you must have an Epic Games Store account.

Additionally, make sure that you've opted to receive marketing emails from the Epic Games Store. If you've unsubscribed, you sadly won't be able to see this offer. 

If you believe you are eligible for the promotion, contact Epic Games Store's support team: https://www.epicgames.com/help/en-US/   

Q: I see a Sad Trombone error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo link.

A: Would you happen to be entering this Nitro promo link from the promotion into the Discord Gift Inventory or as a link within Discord chat?

If so, this is the incorrect method for redeeming the Nitro promo link, and you will see an error when attempting to redeem the promotion.

In order to successfully claim this promotion, enter only your unique 24-digit code from the Nitro promotion link in the following format: XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

Q: I see a "Oh no! It looks like you have Nitro already" error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.

A: If you're seeing an "Oh no! It looks like you have Nitro already" error, that means that the Discord account you're trying to redeem this promotion on currently has a Nitro subscription so it is ineligible for this Nitro promotion.

Please make sure you're logged into the account that you want to redeem this promotion on. Or you can give the promotion link to a friend who hasn't had Nitro before.

Q: I see a "Sorry, looks like you’ve already had a Nitro sub!" error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.

A: If you're seeing an “Sorry, looks like you’ve already had a Nitro sub” error, that means that you've previously subscribed to Nitro on your Discord account and you won't be able to redeem this 1 month perk.

If you have never subscribed to Nitro, please submit a ticket through our support system: https://dis.gd/contact and our support team will be able to investigate further.

Be sure to include your full Discord ID and email address tied to your Discord account.

Q: I see a "This gift has already been claimed" error when I try to claim my Nitro promo.

A: If you are seeing a "This gift has been redeemed already" error, that means that the Nitro promo link has already been used and cannot be used again. You may need to double check if you've redeemed this promo link on another Discord account.

In particular, if you redeem this promo link using your mobile device, double check the browser on your mobile device and see which Discord account you are currently logged into.

Unfortunately, once the promo link has been redeemed, the promo link cannot be re-enabled, and the Nitro cannot be transferred from one account to another.

Q: I see a "Wait a Second...Looks like this code didn't work." error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.

A: If you're seeing an “Wait a Second...Looks like this code didn't work.” error, that means that the link is invalid. If you've copy and pasted this link, we recommend you double check the link you were given once more and make sure it exactly matches the link sent to your email.

If you received this link from a friend, double check with your friend on the exact link to make sure that it matches the link in their email.

Please note that our support team is unable to intervene if your friend has given an invalid link and we will not be able to provide a new link.

Q: I see a "Sorry, This Payment Source Cannot Be Used for Redemption" error when trying to redeem my promo!

A: If you're seeing a "Sorry, This Payment Source Cannot Be Used for Redemption" error, that means that the payment method you've selected to cover the temporary $1 hold cannot be used for that purpose. 

Please keep in mind that prepaid payment methods, such as Gcash, cannot be used to cover temporary holds due to the nature of how prepaid payment methods function.

For more information on temporary holds, please check out this article!

Q: I see a “Looks like this promotion has reached its maximum number of claims” error when trying to redeem my promo!

A: If you are seeing a “Looks like this promotion has reached its maximum number of claims” error, that means the maximum limit for claims of this promotion has been reached and this promotion can no longer be claimed. If you have claimed this Nitro promotion, you are still able to redeem it to your Discord account!

Please note that the support team is unable to assist you if you run into this error and we are not able to increase the limit of claims.

Q: I see a “Looks like your email isn’t verified. Make sure to verify your email before claiming this gift.”

A: If you are seeing a “Looks like your email isn’t verified, make sure to verify your email before claiming this gift” error, you are trying to redeem this Nitro promotion on a Discord account with an email that hasn’t been verified yet.

You can check out this support article on how to resend the email verification for your Discord account. If you need help setting up your Discord account, you can read our Getting Started article. 

Q: I’m having trouble with my Epic Games Store account.

A: Reach out to Epic Games Store’s support team: https://www.epicgames.com/help/en-US/.

articles.name: How to Request Tax and VAT Exemption Status on Discord
articles.title: How to Request Tax and VAT Exemption Status on Discord
articles.body:
If your organization is claiming exemption from tax based on your tax-exempt status, resale purposes, or other qualifying reasons permitted by law, you'll need to submit proper documentation through our team.

What this article covers:
  • What are Tax Exemptions?
  • Required Documentation 
    • VAT Exemptions 
    • US Tax Exemptions
    • Other Tax Exemptions
  • How to Validate Tax Exemption
  • What Happens After Submission?
  • Frequently Asked Questions

What are Tax Exemptions?

A tax exemption is a specific legal provision that releases certain goods, services, organizations, or individuals from paying the standard tax (i.e. sales tax, VAT, and similar taxes) that would normally apply to a purchase. For Discord users and businesses, this means they may be eligible to have certain taxes not charged to their Discord purchases. These exemptions vary by state, country and jurisdiction.

Required Documentation

Info: It is your responsibility to submit all required information for a tax exemption before making any qualifying purchases. Submitting a tax exemption request does not guarantee you will receive this exemption. Discord will review your documents and relevant tax authority records to determine whether an exemption should be applied.

To help you submit the correct documentation for your tax exemption request, review the section below that applies to your situation:

VAT Exemptions 

If you're requesting a VAT exemption, you'll need to provide:

  • Your valid VAT ID number - this must be active and verifiable
  • Your country of registration
  • Complete invoice details including your registered business name and address

US Tax Exemptions

For organizations based in the United States, please provide:

  • Your sales tax exemption certificate with all required fields completed. Forms will vary by state, so please be sure to provide us with the form applicable to your state.
  • Your state code - this is required for proper processing
  • Complete invoice information matching your tax-exempt organization

Other Tax Exemptions

For all other types of tax exemptions, you'll need:

  • A valid Tax ID number from your local tax authority
  • Your country of registration
  • Complete invoice details that match your registration
Info: We verify the documentation for accuracy and validity. If necessary, we may contact the issuing state’s or country’s tax authority to confirm legitimacy.

How to Validate Tax Exemption

Info: Tax exemptions apply only from the date of approval onward—previous purchases cannot be adjusted. Once validated, the exemption automatically applies to all future purchases.

To help you get your tax exemption approved quickly, here's what we look for when reviewing your request:

  • Valid ID Check: We'll verify your VAT/Tax ID with the official tax authorities to ensure it's current and valid.
  • Regional Verification: Your tax exemption must be applicable in your specific country or region.
  • Matching Addresses: For your security, your payment method's billing address needs to match the country where your tax exemption is registered.
  • Documentation Review: We'll check that all your invoice details align with our verification records.
  • Final Review: Our Support team will carefully review your application to ensure everything is in order.
Info: Having all these items ready before submission can help speed up the approval process.

What Happens After Submission?

Once you submit your tax exemption request, our dedicated Support team will carefully review your application. Here's what you can expect:

If Your Request is Approved:

  • Our Support team will process your exemption within 5-7 business days
  • You'll receive a confirmation email with your exemption details
  • All future purchases will automatically be tax-exempt
  • We may periodically verify that your tax exemption is still valid
  • You can view your tax-exempt status in your account settings

If Your Request Needs Additional Information:

  • Our team will reach out via email with specific instructions
  • You'll have 30 days to provide the requested documentation
  • Your application will remain pending during this time

If Your Request is Not Approved:

  • You'll receive an email explaining why your request wasn't approved
  • Your purchases will continue to include applicable taxes
Contact Us: Our support team is always here to assist you with any questions about your tax exemption status.

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: How long does the tax exemption approval process take?

A: The standard processing time is 5-7 business days after submission of a complete application with all required documentation.

Q: Can I get a refund for taxes paid before my exemption was approved?

A: No, tax exemptions only apply to future purchases from the date of approval. Previous purchases cannot be adjusted retroactively.

Q: What happens if my tax ID or status changes?

A: You must notify our Support team immediately of any changes to your tax status or ID. This may require submitting a new application with updated documentation.

Q: Can I use my tax exemption for multiple Discord accounts?

A: Each tax exemption is tied to a specific account and billing address. Separate applications are required for different accounts or organizations.

Q: What if I need to update my business information?

A: Contact our support team with any changes to your business details. Some updates may require new documentation or re-verification of your tax-exempt status.

Q: How do I know if my organization qualifies for tax exemption?

A: Qualification depends on your organization's legal status and local tax regulations. We recommend consulting with your tax advisor or reviewing your local tax authority guidelines.

Q: Can I get a tax exemption for purchases I made through Apple and/or Google Play?

A: We cannot assist with tax exemption requests for purchases made through Apple or Google Play.

articles.name: How do I use Google Pay and Apple Pay?
articles.title: How do I use Google Pay and Apple Pay?
articles.body:
Discord now supports Google Pay and Apple Pay for select billing flows on both desktop and browser. 

What this article covers:
  • How do I use Google Pay and Apple Pay?
    • Desktop
    • Browser
  • System Requirements
  • Frequently Asked Questions

How do I use Google Pay and Apple Pay?

When you're prompted to add a payment method, you'll see Google Pay or Apple Pay buttons if your browser and operating system support them.

Desktop 

When purchasing Nitro for yourself through the Discord desktop app, you'll see Google Pay and Apple Pay as payment options.

Payment method window on desktop

When selecting either of these options, a browser window will open to verify if your system supports the selected payment method. 

  

Example of selecting Google Pay (Left) or Apple Pay (Right) on desktop

Browser 

If your desktop or mobile browser supports Google or Apple Pay, you can complete your checkout using that payment method! 

If these options aren’t available, you’ll be redirected to our standard credit card form to complete your purchase.

Example of payment method window without Google Pay support on desktop browser

System Requirements 

To use Google Pay: 

  • Chrome version 61 or newer

To use Apple Pay: 

  • Safari browser on macOS Sierra or later (desktop)
  • Safari on iOS 10.1 or later (mobile)
  • Active Apple Pay setup with a valid payment card (learn how to set up Apple Pay)

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Can I use Google Pay on any browser?

A: No, Google Pay is only supported on Chrome browser version 61 or later.

Q: What devices support Apple Pay?

A: Apple Pay works on:

  • Desktop: Safari browser on macOS Sierra or later
  • Mobile: Safari browser on iOS 10.1 or later

Q: What happens if my browser doesn't support Google Pay or Apple Pay?

A: You'll be redirected to the standard credit card payment form to complete your purchase.

Q: Where can I use Google Pay and Apple Pay on Discord?

A: Currently, these payment methods are supported for select billing flows, including purchasing Nitro for yourself on the Discord desktop app.

Q: Do I need to set up anything before using Apple Pay?

A: Yes, you need to have Apple Pay already set up with a valid payment card on your device before using it on Discord.

Q: How does the payment process work?

A: When you select Google Pay or Apple Pay as your payment method, a browser window will open to verify your system's compatibility and process the payment securely.

articles.name: Discord Sign-Up and Registration Guide
articles.title: Discord Sign-Up and Registration Guide
articles.body:
Creating a Discord account is quick and easy! This guide walks you through the sign-up process and helps resolve common registration issues so that you can start chatting with friends as soon as possible!

What this article covers:
    • How to Sign Up for Discord
      • Desktop/Browser
      • Mobile
      • How to Register or Sign Up via Discord Invite
    • How to Troubleshoot Registration Errors
      • Email is Already Registered
      • Other Errors

How to Sign Up for Discord

Desktop/Browser

1. Open the Discord desktop app or visit https://discord.com/login in your browser to create an account. Click on Register.

Example of where the Register button is located on desktop/browser

Tip: To download the Discord desktop app, visit https://discord.com/download.

2. Enter your account registration information including your email, username, password, and date of birth. 

Double-check that your email address is spelled correctly— otherwise, you won't be able to change it after registration.

Press Continue once you’re finished.

Example of the Create an account screen on desktop/browser

3. Complete the CAPTCHA if prompted. Then you'll be logged in and ready to use your new Discord account! 

Mobile

1. Download Discord from your app store and then open the Discord app.

Tip: To download the Discord mobile app for iOS or Android, visit https://discord.com/download.

2. Tap Register to begin creating an account.

Example of the Register button on mobile

3. Enter your phone number or email address.

Example of Enter phone or email for registration on mobile

4. Follow the on-screen prompts and enter the required registration information. 

Tap Register after entering your date of birth. 

5. You're now logged in and ready to enjoy your new Discord account!

How To Register or Sign Up via Discord Invite

If someone sends you a Discord invite link to join a server and you don’t already have a Discord account, you’ll be prompted to create one.

Example of a Discord invite link

If you tap on the invite link to join, you’ll be redirected to the login page. Depending on the device you’re  using, follow these instructions:

  • Desktop/Browser
  • Mobile

How to Troubleshoot Registration Errors

Email is Already Registered

If you see the error message Email is already registered, it means this email address is already linked to a Discord account. 

Remember, you can only use an email address with one Discord account at a time. 

Tip: If you’re already logged into another Discord account, you’ll need to log out to be able to register a new account.

Example of Email is already registered error message

Other Errors

Contact Us: If you encounter any other errors while registering for Discord, please contact our Discord Support team at dis.gd/contact.
Want to learn more?
For account verification issues, please refer to our Help Center article How to Verify Your Discord Account.

articles.name: Free Nitro Trial for May 2025
articles.title: Free Nitro Trial for May 2025
articles.body:
Free Nitro? We got you! Eligible users will enjoy all the cool Nitro perks for one week—no payment method required. Whether you're new to Nitro or just curious about what the perks can do, we'll guide you through everything included in this limited-time offer.

What this article covers:
  • Promotion Summary
    • Eligibility Conditions
  • What is Discord Nitro?
  • How to Redeem
  • Frequently Asked Questions

Promotion Summary

Offer Details: Select users get a free one-week Nitro trial starting May 6, 2025 (10:00AM PT)! 

Info: This limited-time offer is available to eligible users only. If you're not eligible for this promotion, stay tuned for future opportunities!

Eligibility Conditions

In order to redeem this trial, we have a few requirements you'll need to meet first: 

  • You have not redeemed any trial or discount in the past three months
  • You have not canceled your Nitro subscription in the past 30 days
  • Your Discord account must be more than 30 days old
  • You do not have an active Nitro, Nitro Classic, or Nitro Basic subscription or any active Nitro Credits
  • You don’t have a Server Boost-only subscription
  • You don’t currently have any active trial or discount offers
Info: If you do not see the offer in your Nitro Tab, you are not eligible for this promotion.

Deadline for Promo: If eligible, you will receive this offer by logging onto the Discord desktop app or browser client by May 23, 2025 (5:00PM PT). The promotion will automatically be granted to your account if you qualify.

Important: If you purchase a subscription during your free trial week, your paid subscription will start right away and replace your trial. You won't be able to use any remaining trial days. For example, if you buy a subscription three days into your trial, you'll switch to the paid subscription immediately rather than finishing the last four days of your trial. If you earn a one-day Nitro reward from completing a Quest while your one-week trial is active, the one-day reward will replace your remaining trial time. This means your trial will end, and you'll receive only the one-day of Nitro instead of your remaining trial days.

What is Discord Nitro?

Discord Nitro is our premium subscription that unlocks a world of perks for your account. Personalize and enhance your experience with popular perks like HD streaming, 500MB file uploads, profile and avatar customizations, and more:

  • Custom & Animated Emojis
  • Custom Profiles
  • HD Streaming
  • Discord App Color Themes
  • Special Shop Perks
  • More Nitro & Nitro Basic perks

How to Redeem

Info: Eligible users can start their free one-week Nitro trial as soon as they log into the Discord desktop app or browser client. Though the trial must be received through the desktop app or browser client, users can enjoy all Nitro features on both desktop, browser, and mobile devices afterwards.

After the initial free trial expires, you can receive an additional bonus one-week trial of Nitro by adding a payment method and selecting a Nitro subscription. After your bonus trial week ends, your plan will convert to a paid subscription, unless cancelled. This gives you the opportunity to enjoy two weeks of Nitro trials in total! 

During the bonus week trial, you can manage your subscription settings through your User Settings > Nitro. If you don’t cancel your subscription during your bonus week trial, your subscription will convert to a paid subscription for the plan selected. Learn more in the cancellation guide here. 

Example of Free Nitro Trial Window

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Do I need to do anything special to claim this trial?
A: If you opened your desktop app and saw a notification saying ‘You’ve got Nitro’, then you don’t need to do anything else to redeem the one-week trial. You’re good to go. Enjoy!

Q: Do I need a payment method?

A: No payment method is required to start your free trial.

Q: Can I cancel my trial before it ends?

A: You will not be able to cancel your initial trial once it begins. Your Nitro benefits will remain active until the end of the trial period. 

During the bonus week trial, you can cancel anytime. You can manage your subscription settings through your User Settings > Nitro. If you don’t cancel your subscription during your bonus week trial, your subscription will convert to a paid subscription for the plan selected. Learn more in the cancellation guide here. 

Q: Can I claim the free Nitro trial on my mobile device?

A: No, the trial can only be claimed through the Discord desktop app or web client. However, once you've claimed the trial on desktop, you'll be able to enjoy all Nitro features across both desktop and mobile devices.

Q: I don't see the trial offer or did not receive it. Why?

A: This trial is subject to eligibility restrictions. If you do not see the trial on your account, this indicates that you are not eligible at this time. Please note that the Discord support team is not able to bypass eligibility restrictions.

Q: What happens if I purchase a subscription during my free trial?

A: Your paid subscription will begin immediately, replacing your trial. Any remaining trial days will be forfeited. For instance, if you purchase a subscription on day three of your trial, you'll immediately switch to the paid subscription instead of using your remaining four trial days.

Q: What happens if I complete a Quest and earn Nitro during my one-week trial?
If you earn a one-day Nitro reward from completing a Quest while your one-week trial is active, the one-day reward will replace your remaining trial time. This means your trial will end, and you'll receive only the one-day of Nitro instead of your remaining trial days.

Q: What is this free Nitro trial I received?

A: Discord is currently offering a special Nitro trial to selected users. This trial grants you access to Nitro features without requiring a payment method upfront. Users who upgrade to a paid subscription at the end of their trial will receive a bonus one-week trial upon upgrading.

Q: Is this free Nitro trial legitimate?

A: Yes! This is an official Discord trial offer that is being granted to a limited number of eligible users.

Q: How long does the trial last?

A: You can enjoy your Nitro perks for the duration of your trial period. When the trial ends, you'll have the option to either subscribe to Nitro and receive a bonus one-week free or let the trial expire.

Q: Can Discord Support give me access to the trial?

A: No, our Support team cannot manually grant access to this trial. 

Q: How do I manage my subscription after the initial trial?

A: When the initial trial ends, you'll have the option to either subscribe to Nitro and receive a bonus one-week trial or let the initial trial expire. If you sign up for the bonus one-week trial, your trial will convert to a paid subscription at the end of this additional week, unless cancelled before the end of the trial. You can manage your subscription settings at any time during the bonus trial through your User Settings > Nitro. Learn more in the cancellation guide here.

Q: What happens if I cancel during the bonus trial period?

A: If you sign up for the bonus trial by adding a payment method after your first week, you can cancel any time during the additional week trial. If you cancel, you will continue to access your Nitro trial for the remainder of the trial, but will lose access to Nitro perks at the end of the trial. 

Q: What features are limited during the free trial?

A: During the free Nitro trial period, there are some limitations compared to a paid subscription:

  • The two Server Boosts and the 30% off any additional future Boost purchases that normally come with paid Nitro are not included
  • You cannot purchase additional Server Boosts
  • You will not receive the Nitro Badge
  • You will not be eligible for the Share Nitro offer

These features and options will become available once your trial ends and you subscribe to a paid Nitro plan.

articles.name: Discord Troubleshooting Guide
articles.title: Discord Troubleshooting Guide
articles.body:
Welcome to the Discord troubleshooting guide. Identify and discover solutions for common technical issues and find the right support channels to help resolve your concerns quickly and effectively.

What this article covers:
  • Understanding the Difference: Bugs vs. Troubleshooting Issues
  • Common Troubleshooting Categories
    • Connection Issues
    • Audio and Video Issues
    • Installation & Update Issues
  • Common Troubleshooting Steps
  • When to Report a Bug

Understanding the Difference: Bugs vs. Troubleshooting Issues

Before diving into specific problems, it's important to understand the difference between a bug and a troubleshooting issue:

  • Troubleshooting Issues: These are common problems that can be resolved through standard solutions, settings adjustments, or basic fixes. Examples include connection problems, audio issues, or display settings.
  • Bugs: These are unexpected behaviors or malfunctions in Discord's software that cannot be resolved through standard troubleshooting steps and require attention from Discord's development team.

Common Troubleshooting Categories

Connection Issues

Server connection problems

  • Check if Discord is down using our Status page
  • Test your internet connection at speedtest.net
  • Try switching to a different DNS server

Voice chat disconnections

  • Ensure your network has adequate bandwidth (minimum 300kbps up/down)
  • Try selecting a different voice server region
  • Check for VPN or firewall interference

Loading screen freezes

  • Clear Discord's cache and temporary files
  • Try running Discord as administrator
  • Disable hardware acceleration in User Settings > Advance. 
Info: Check the Discord Status page for real-time updates on service availability.
For detailed connection troubleshooting, check these helpful articles:

  • Voice Connection Errors

  • I'm hearing Robotic and Distorted voices. How do I fix it?

Audio and Video Issues

1. Quick fixes to try first

  • Restart Discord completely
  • Check your default audio/video devices in Discord Voice & Video Settings
  • Make sure Discord has permission to access your mic/camera
  • Try both Standard and Legacy audio subsystems

2. Microphone not working

  • Verify mic permissions in your OS settings
  • Check input/output device selection in Voice Settings
  • Test mic in Discord's Voice Settings

3. Speaker/headphone issues

  • Confirm correct output device is selected
  • Check volume mixer settings
  • Try toggling between Legacy and Standard audio subsystem

4. Video and camera problems

  • Check camera permissions in OS and Discord settings
  • Try a different browser if using Discord web
  • Ensure other apps aren't using your camera

5. Echo or feedback in calls

  • Lower input sensitivity in Voice Settings
  • Use push-to-talk instead of voice activity
  • Ensure speakers aren't too close to your microphone
For additional audio and video troubleshooting steps, check Discord's Voice and Video Troubleshooting Guide.

Installation & Update Issues

Mobile Installation Problems

  • Clear app cache and data in device settings
  • Ensure adequate storage space is available
  • Try uninstalling and reinstalling from official app store
  • Check device compatibility and OS version

Windows Installation Errors

  • Run installer as administrator
  • Disable antivirus temporarily during installation
  • Clear temporary files and previous installation remnants
  • Use the Clean Install tool for corrupt installations

macOS Installation Issues

  • Check system requirements (macOS 11 or later)
  • Clear ~/Library/Application Support/discord directory
  • Verify disk permissions
  • Download fresh installer from Discord website

Update Problems

  • Force quit Discord from Task Manager/Activity Monitor
  • Delete Discord AppData folder (Windows) or Application Support folder (macOS)
  • Disable proxy/VPN during installation
  • Check firewall settings
Before attempting any installation fixes, back up your Discord settings and data. Visit these guides for platform-specific troubleshooting:
  • Mobile Installation & Crashing Guide
  • macOS Installation Guide
  • Windows Corrupt Installation Guide
  • Windows Installer Errors Guide

Common Troubleshooting Steps

Following these common troubleshooting steps can help resolve many common Discord issues quickly, from connection problems to audio glitches, without needing to contact support or wait for assistance:  

1. Check your internet connection

  • Run a speed test to verify adequate bandwidth
  • Try connecting to a different network if possible

2. Restart Discord

  • Fully close Discord (check Task Manager)
  • Wait 30 seconds before reopening

3. Clear Discord cache

  • Windows: %appdata%/discord/Cache
  • Mac: ~/Library/Application Support/discord/Cache

4. Update Discord to the latest version

  • Check for updates in Settings > App Settings
  • Download fresh install from discord.com if needed

5. Check system requirements

  • Windows 10+ or macOS 11 (Big Sur)
  • Minimum 4GB RAM recommended

When to Report a Bug

If you've tried all relevant troubleshooting steps and the issue persists, you may have encountered a bug. Follow these steps:

1. Document the issue with screenshots or recordings

  • Include error messages if any appear
  • Record steps that consistently reproduce the issue

2. Note the steps to reproduce the problem

  • Be specific about actions taken
  • Include your system specifications

3. Check if others are experiencing the same issue

  • Search Discord's support forum
  • Check Discord's Twitter for known issues

4. Submit a bug report through Discord's support portal

  • Include all gathered information
  • Be clear and concise in your description
Before reporting a bug, search the Troubleshooting Help section to ensure your issue hasn't already been documented.
Looking for more help? Check out these related articles:

  • Voice and Video Troubleshooting

  • Color Issues in Go Live/Screenshare for NVIDIA Graphics Card

  • Computer Freeze while Screen Sharing or Go Live FAQ

  • And much more!

articles.name: 1 Month of Discord Nitro for Customers of Select Corsair Products
articles.title: 1 Month of Discord Nitro for Customers of Select Corsair Products
articles.body:
Starting from June 26, 2025 (6:00AM PT) to June 26, 2026 (11:59PM PT), Corsair customers can claim 1 month of Discord Nitro from purchasing eligible Corsair products. Learn below about how you can claim Discord Nitro.

Promotion Summary

Offer Details: 1 month of Discord Nitro

Who is Eligible: Users who have had an active Nitro subscription or Nitro trial in the last 12 months are not eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

This promotion is not eligible in the following regions: Syria, Russia, Turkey, Iran, North Korea, Zaporizhzhia, Kherson, Donetsk, and Luhansk. 

We may add additional restrictions from time to time, if you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Users who have had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on their accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If a user has had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on their account and they’ve never had a Nitro subscription, redeeming this promotion will override that subscription.

We will not be able to refund any leftover subscription time from those, and the user will be forfeiting the remainder of the existing subscription when activating the 1 month Nitro trial.

Users who have already claimed a gift from this promotion are not eligible to claim further gifts from this promotion.

This promotion is not eligible in the following regions: Syria, Russia, Turkey, Iran, North Korea, Zaporizhzhia, Kherson, Donetsk, and Luhansk. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Requirements: Claim the promo by purchasing eligible Corsair products starting June 26, 2025 (6:00AM PT), and redeem in your Discord account by July 26, 2026 (11:59PM PT).

Subscription: After the 1 month trial period, your Nitro subscription will convert to a monthly recurring subscription, and Discord will bill your payment method per month until you cancel it. You can cancel at any time in your Discord User Settings. 

What this article covers:
  • Promotion Summary
  • What is Discord Nitro?
  • What is Corsair?
  • How do I claim the Nitro Promo from my Corsair product?  
  • How do I redeem the Nitro Trial on my Discord Account? 
    • Eligibility for Redeeming the Nitro Trial
    • Step by Step Redeem Instructions
      • What if I am an Active Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting Subscriber? 
  • Frequently Asked Questions
    • Promotion Details
    • Eligibility for the Promotion
    • Payment Info and Subscription Questions
    • Potential Errors and Other Issues

What is Discord Nitro?

Discord Nitro is our Subscription plan that gives you access to special perks that’ll make your time on Discord as fun as ever! Personalize and enhance your experience with popular perks like HD streaming, 500MB file uploads, profile and avatar customizations, 2 free Server Boosts, and more:

  • Custom Emojis
  • Discord App Color Themes
  • Super Reactions
  • Avatar Decorations
  • Unique Server Profiles
  • Server Boosts
  • More Nitro & Nitro Basic perks

What is Corsair?

CORSAIR (Nasdaq: CRSR) is a leading global developer and manufacturer of high-performance gear and technology for gamers, content creators, and PC enthusiasts. From award-winning PC components and peripherals to premium streaming equipment, smart ambient lighting, and esports coaching services, CORSAIR delivers a full ecosystem of products that work together to enable everyone, from casual gamers to committed professionals, to perform at their very best.

Copyright ©2025 Corsair Memory, Inc. All rights reserved. CORSAIR and the sails logo are registered trademarks of CORSAIR in the United States and/or other countries. All other company and/or product names may be trade names, trademarks, and/or registered trademarks of the respective owners with which they are associated. Features, pricing, availability, and specifications are subject to change without notice.

How do I claim the Nitro Promo from my Corsair product?

 Step 1 - Purchase and Add the Offer: 

  • Purchase a qualifying product/SKU on Corsair.com and be sure to press "Add deal to Cart" when you see the Nitro offer during checkout.

Discord Nitro Offer Add-On

Step 2 - Check Your Shipping Confirmation

  • Once your order ships, you'll receive an email from Corsair containing a redemption link. Select this redemption link to proceed to the next step. 

Step 3 - Redeem Your Code

  • Follow the instructions to redeem your Nitro Trial code within Discord and start enjoying your month of Nitro. 

How do I redeem the Nitro Trial on my Discord Account?

Once you have claimed the promo, you'll now need to officially redeem this promo on your Discord account. You must redeem this Nitro trial by July 26, 2026 (11:59PM PT).

Eligibility for Redeeming the Nitro Trial

This promotion is not eligible in the following regions: Syria, Russia, Turkey, Iran, North Korea, Zaporizhzhia, Kherson, Donetsk, and Luhansk. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Users who have had an active Nitro subscription or Nitro trial in the last 12 months are not eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Users who have had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on their accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If a user has had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on their account and they’ve never had a Nitro subscription, redeeming this promotion will override that subscription.

Users who have already claimed a gift from this promotion are not eligible to claim further gifts from this promotion.

Step by Step Redeem Instructions

If you're eligible and ready to redeem this Nitro subscription on your own Discord account, you can follow these steps below to redeem the promo.

Info:
- Before redeeming Nitro, make sure you are logged in your own Discord account.
- If you accidentally redeemed the Nitro promo on an account that is not yours, we are unable to provide you with another promo.

Step 1 - Logging into Discord

  • If you're not already logged into Discord in your browser, you will then be automatically redirected to either:

Register for a New Account

If you don't have an account, you can directly register a new Discord account

Login to your Account

If you already have a Discord account, you can login to your account using your email and password or using QR code login

Create an account page

Login page

Step 2 - Claiming your promotion gift

Once you have logged into your Discord account, you'll see a new message asking you to confirm that you are accepting the Nitro subscription on the correct Discord account.

  • You'll see a notice saying: "You are accepting this gift as _________" 
  • If your Discord account does not have your payment information, you'll be asked to fill out your payment details. (Note: You will not be charged until the free trial ends and the subscription renews)
  • When you've filled out all the necessary information and you're ready to redeem this promotion, press the "Accept Gift" button. 
Info:

- If you're logged into the incorrect Discord account, press the "Wrong account" button to login to the other account.

Step 3 - Redeeming your promotion gift

1 Month of Nitro Gift

Review the details of the promotion then press on Next. Please note: if you switch to a different account at this step, you will not be able to claim and redeem the promotion on the account you switched to. 

Payment Details Review

Make sure your payment information is accurate. If your Discord account does not have your payment information, please fill out your payment details. You will not be charged until the trial ends and the subscription renews.

When you've filled out all the necessary information and you're ready to redeem this promotion, press the confirmation button.

Step 4 - Subscription Now Activated

  • After accepting the promo to your account, you'll now be automatically redirected to your Subscriptions tab in your User Settings to see your newly activated Nitro subscription on your account.

What if I am an Active Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting Subscriber? 

Just to clarify - if you have had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on your account and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

So long as you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on your account and you’ve never had a Nitro subscription, you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 1 month Nitro subscription.

HOWEVER, please note: By choosing to activate this 1 month trial, you will lose any features associated with your current subscriptions, and **you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current subscription**.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro subscription per month unless you cancel your subscription.

How do I share my Code with a Friend?

If you're unable to redeem the Nitro subscription link, you can share this link with a friend to use instead.

After you press on and open the promotion link, you can directly copy the promotion URL link in the new page and send it to a friend. We recommend sending the link in a private direct message. Make sure your friend redeems the code by July 26, 2026 (11:59PM PT). 

Frequently Asked Questions

We know there's a lot of information to unpack on this promotion above, so we've also broken down this information in this FAQ section as well too.

  • Promotion Details
  • Eligibility for the Promotion
  • Payment Info and Subscription Questions
  • Potential Errors and Other Issues
    • Already Had/Have Nitro
    • Already Redeemed
    • Something's Wrong Here

Promotion Details

Q: How long does this promotion run for?

A: Corsair customers can purchase eligible Corsair products starting on June 26, 2025 (6:00AM PT) through June 26, 2026 (11:59PM PT). The 1-month Nitro promotion must be redeemed by July 26, 2026 (11:59PM PT). 

After July 26, 2026 (11:59PM PT), Corsair customers will no longer be able to claim a trial promo.

Q: How long does the Discord Nitro promotion last for?

A: You must redeem the Nitro promotion by July 26, 2026 (11:59PM PT).

If a code has not been redeemed to the Discord account by July 26, 2026 (11:59PM PT), it will expire and you will no longer be able to have 1 month of Discord Nitro.

Eligibility for the Promotion

Q: Who can claim this promotion from their Corsair purchase?

A: Eligible Corsair customers who purchase an eligible Corsair product can claim this promotion. Simply add a qualifying product/SKU to your cart on Corsair.com and press "Add deal to Cart" when you see the Nitro offer during checkout. Once your order ships, you'll receive an email with a redemption link that takes you directly to Discord to complete the process. Find more detailed redemption steps here.  

Q: Who can redeem this Nitro trial to their Discord account?

A: Users who have never had an active Nitro subscription on their Discord accounts are eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Additionally, users who previously had a Discord Nitro subscription and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months are ineligible.

This promotion is not eligible in the following regions: Syria, Russia, Turkey, Iran, North Korea, Zaporizhzhia, Kherson, Donetsk, and Luhansk. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Q: What if I'm a current or previous Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or a Server Boost subscription? Can I also take part in this promotion? 

A: If you previously had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on your accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on your account and you’ve never had a Nitro subscription,  you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 1 month Nitro subscription.

HOWEVER, please note: By choosing to activate this 1 month trial, you will lose any features associated with your current subscriptions, and **you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current subscription**.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro subscription per month unless you cancel your subscription.

Payment Info and Subscription Questions

Q: Why do I need to submit my payment info to redeem Nitro?

A: Because Nitro is a subscription plan, at the end of your 1 month trial, we will start your first billing cycle so you can continue to enjoy Nitro on Discord.

However, you can cancel the Nitro subscription at any time before the end of the 1 month.

Q: Why do I see a temporary hold/charge on my account when this is supposed to be a free promotion?

A: Just to clarify, this Nitro promotion is free, however, there will be a temporary hold placed on the payment method upon activating the promotion. This is to help Discord confirm the payment method works as expected and to prevent the use of fraudulent payment methods. This charge will appear in your Discord transaction history, and it may appear as a hold on your payment method.

We immediately reverse the temporary hold, and you’ll see that reflected in your Discord transaction history. Your bank may take longer to remove the hold from your payment method.

Note: Banks will usually remove the temporary hold from your account within a few business days.

If your Discord transaction history does not show the hold released after 5 business days, please let us know at https://dis.gd/contact, and our support team will be able to investigate this issue further.

Potential Errors and Other Issues

Q: I see a "Oh no! It looks like you have Nitro already" error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.

A: If you're seeing an "Oh no! It looks like you have Nitro already" error, that means that the Discord account you're trying to redeem this promotion on currently has a Nitro subscription so it is ineligible for this Nitro promotion.

Please make sure you're logged into the account that you want to redeem this promotion on.

Q: I see a "Sorry, looks like you’ve already had a Nitro sub!" error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.

A: If you're seeing an “Sorry, looks like you’ve already had a Nitro sub” error, that means that you've previously subscribed to Nitro on your Discord account and you won't be able to redeem this 1 month perk.

If you have never subscribed to Nitro, please submit a ticket through our support system: https://dis.gd/contact and our support team will be able to investigate further.
